title: How to tell if my Stylo 5 LG Boost phone is unlocked - Quora

response.answer_text: If you haven't called Boost and asked them to unlock it, then its locked. Virtually all prepaid (and most postpaid) phones are sold locked because they are sold on a subsidy or payment plan. They don't just magically become unlocked because you paid them off or the unlicking date hss passe. You nees to take action yourself to get them unlocked yourself To verify, stick a SIM from another Provider into it and see what happen.
Put sims chip from other company in it
